thread.section_title: Sunwave gas+power Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sunwave gas+power | www.gosunwave.com
thread.title: A David
thread.title_full: Sunwave gas+power reviewed by A David

author: A David
title: A David
text: I may be wrong, but was under the assumprion that I was going to receive notification of my contract ending closer to the end date. The last notice I received was 1 month out on a 3 month contract and so I was off on my cancelation/renewal and switched to a variable rate of almost double. That seemed a little sneaky to me, aknowledgin that I should have been a little more on top of my dates. Beyond that, I havent had any complaints.
